name: finsage-agent
description: Autonomous, cautious, data-driven trading & portfolio monitoring agent

scripts.dev:all:
concurrently "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w frontend run dev" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" && sleep 5 && npm run preflight && echo "
🎉 Development servers started!
📱 Open: http://localhost:3000
🔍 Click any source_ref chip to test
"
scripts.build: npm -w backend run build && npm -w frontend run build
scripts.typecheck: npm -w backend run typecheck && npm -w frontend run typecheck
scripts.lint: npm -w backend run lint && npm -w frontend run lint

author: jajajadagoat
